home.title: Transfer
home.claimable_mdt: You have {num} MDT to claim today!

transfer.title: Transfer Out
transfer.successdetail_email_nonuser: Your transaction will be completed when your friend claims the tokens.
transfer.successdetail_ethwallet:
Your MDT is on its way...
 We are processing the transaction. Please check the status in your transaction history.
transfer.transferlist_emailtitle: Transfer MDT to Another Email Account
transfer.transferlist_ethtitle: Send MDT to your own wallet address
transfer.tutorial_description: MDT is an ERC20 token. Transferring tokens to an Ethereum wallet requires gas which is paid in Ether. When you transfer your MDT to an Ethereum wallet, the gas is calculated in MDT and deducted from your transaction. Depending on how clogged the Ethereum network is, gas or transaction fee will fluctuate.

qrcode.title: Scan QR Code
qrcode.align_description: Make sure your QR code is within the frame
qrcode.eth_scan_wrong_type: Please scan ETH address QR code only

transaction.title: Transaction
transaction.problemDidNotMakeIt: I did not make this transaction.
transaction.problemMakeItAccidentally: I made this transaction by mistake.
transaction.popupCancelDescription: We will not send the recipient an email notification when you cancel your transaction.

phone.title: Phone Setup
phone.skip_setup_content: Are you sure? Adding a phone number will make your account more secure. If you skip now, you can always add your phone number in Settings -> Security.
phone.phone_setup_success: You have successfully set up your phone number!
phone.phone_update_success: You have successfully updated your phone number!

Update your phone number on your account.

reportProblem.title: Report Problem
reportProblem.description:
Use the form below to send us your comments.
Please describe the problem as specific as possible. For example, include the account you are having trouble with, what you did and what happened.
If you provide us with your email address, you agree that we may contact you to better understand the comments you submitted.
reportProblem.errorMessage:
Sorry your comments cannot be submitted now.
You can contact token@mdt.co for help.

earnMDT.title: Earn Rewards
earnMDT.rewardErrorMessage: Failed to claim reward. Please refresh and try again.

dataPointsReward.description: MailTime rewards users for aggregated anonymous data, which means no personal, identifiable data will be shared. All the rewards from anonymous data sharing are distributed on a monthly basis.

earnMDT.redeemTitle: You got a MDT redeem code?

wechat.stepTitle: Tutorial of following our WeChat public channel
wechat.step2: 2. Open WeChat, click "+" button in top right corner, and then click "Scan"
wechat.step3: 3. Click "Album" in top right corner and choose the QR Code
wechat.step6: 6. Enter and submit "MyMDT" to get the magic code
wechat.step7: 7. Come back MyMDT and enter the magic code to get your MDT reward
wechat.successDescription: Thank you for following official WeChat channel. Please go back to Earn Rewards page to earn reward.
wechat.failureDescription: Please follow below steps to get a Magic code.

weibo.step1: 1. Open Weibo, click “Follow” button to subscribe
weibo.step3: 3. Enter “MyMDT” to get the magic code
weibo.step4: 4. Come back here and enter the magic code to get your MDT reward
weibo.successDescription: Thank you for following official Weibo account. Please go back to Earn Rewards page to earn reward.
weibo.failureDescription: Please follow below steps to get a Magic code.

tutorial.slide_1_description: Welcome to MailTime Rewards Program where you get rewarded for what you do and create in the app.
tutorial.slide_2_description: All you need to do is to finish specific tasks while using the  app like sending out an email, or adding another email account.
tutorial.slide_3_description: Your rewards in this program will be counted as MDT, which can be traded and spent in the MailTime ecosystem in the future.
tutorial.slide_4_description: All transactions are authorised by your PIN. Add your phone number for more security.

betaTesting.title: MailTime Rewards Program Beta Testing
betaTesting.description: Please enter a valid access code, and press “Import Account(s)” to begin your MailTime Rewards Program experience.
betaTesting.agreementDetail: By clicking the button below, your email accounts with MailTime will automatically import into MailTime Rewards Program.
betaTesting.NDA: NDA for Beta Testing with MailTime
betaTesting.agreementCheckbox1: I agree to {0} of MailTime Rewards Program Beta Testing
betaTesting.betaEndTitle: MailTime Rewards Program Closed Beta Testing
betaTesting.betaEndDescription:
The testing has ended. Thank you very much for your participation.
You will receive an email from support@mailtime.com, regarding your final rewards and distribution.
betaTesting.contactus:
If you have any questions, contact my@mdt.co.
You may also join the MailTime Rewards Program beta tester WeChat group — Please add “carina111018” on WeChat and comment “MailTime Rewards Program 公测人员”.

welcome.title: Welcome to MailTime Rewards Program!
welcome.agreementCheckbox1: I agree to {0} of MailTime Rewards Program
welcome.OSNotSupported:
Sorry, this feature is not supported on your device.
MailTime Rewards Program requires Android version 4.4 and above.
welcome.agreementDetail: By clicking the button below, your email accounts in MailTime will automatically be imported into MailTime Rewards Program.

twoFactorAuthentication.setupDescription: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a security feature. It is recommended to be turned on to keep your account secure. When 2FA is turned on, whenever you sign in your account or make transactions, a code will be sent to your phone via text, voice call, or mobile app.
twoFactorAuthentication.pinSetupPopupDescription: To turn on two-factor authentication, you need to either finish setting up PIN and phone number or setting up Google Authenticator first.
twoFactorAuthentication.disable2FAPopupDescription:
2FA is strongly recommended to protect your account and assets.
By turning off 2FA, you agree that you understand the risk of not enabling this security feature.

googleAuth.pinSetupPopupDescription:
You can set up Google Authenticator after you set up your PIN.

What is Google Authenticator?
Google Authenticator adds a second layer of security to your account. When two-factor authentication is on, you will asked to enter your PIN and a verification code from the Google Authenticator when making transactions or logging into the account.
googleAuth.step1Remark: Please make sure that your Google Authenticator app is installed.
googleAuth.step2Procedure1:
If you are new to Google Authenticator, tap on “BEGIN” or “BEGIN SETUP”

If you have used the app before, tap “+” to add an account.
googleAuth.step2Procedure2: Select “Manual entry” or “Enter a provided key”.
googleAuth.step2Procedure3: Use the following as your key.
googleAuth.step2Procedure3Remark: You can screenshot this page to keep a copy
googleAuth.step2Procedure4: Make sure “Time Based” is selected and tap “Add” to complete.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase1:
You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?

Your current 2FA is using Google Authenticator. Your 2FA will switch to SMS if you proceed.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase2:
You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?

Your current 2FA is using Google Authenticator. Your 2FA be disabled if you proceed. You can set up your phone number and turn on 2FA again.
googleAuth.disablePopupContentCase3: You have already set up your Google Authenticator. Do you want to disable it?
googleAuth.continueSetupPopupDescription:
You are halfway setting up your Google Authenticator.

Click “Continue” to continue setting up your Google Authenticator. You will be asked to input the 6-digit verification code.

Click “Start Over” to discard current progress and you will be provided with a new key.
